sections.paragraph: + A part of Eden through which flowed the river Pison (Araxes). It was probably the Grecian Colchis, in the northeast corner of Asia Minor, near the Caspian Sea. + A district in Arabia Felix, (Genesis 10:7) named from the second son of Cush; probably the district of Kualan, in the northwestern part of Yemen.
+ A son of Cush. (Genesis 10:7) + A son of Joktan. (Genesis 10:29)
